title: Twenty-five years of curl
dot: digraph CurlTimeline{rankdir=LR;graph[fontname="Arial", fontsize=12, layout="dot", splines=true, nodesep=0.5, ranksep=1];node[shape=box, fontname="Arial", fontsize=10, style=rounded, color="#4A90E2"];edge[color="#4A90E2", arrowhead=normal];subgraph cluster_intro{label="Curl's Journey: 25 Years of Evolution";style=dashed;color="#7ED321";"1996: httpget Started"->"1998: curl 4.0 Released"->"2000: libcurl Introduced";}subgraph cluster_growth{label="Gradual Growth and Innovation";style=dashed;color="#F5A623";"2001: HTTP/1.1 & IPv6"->"2004: Large File Support"->"2010: GitHub Migration"->"2013: HTTP/2 Support"->"2019: HTTP/3 Support";}subgraph cluster_milestones{label="Milestones and Achievements";style=dashed;color="#D0021B";"2009: Nordic Free Software Award"->"2017: Polhem Prize"->"2021: Contribution to Mars Helicopter"->"2023: 25th Anniversary";}subgraph cluster_team{label="Community and Contributions";style=dashed;color="#BD10E0";"1999: Debian Package"->"2003: Autobuild System"->"2017: OSS-Fuzz Integration"->"2022: 1,560 Test Cases";}"1996: httpget Started"->"1998: curl 4.0 Released"[label="Renamed & Expanded"];"1998: curl 4.0 Released"->"2000: libcurl Introduced"[label="Library Added"];"2000: libcurl Introduced"->"2004: Large File Support"[label="Continuous Improvement"];"2004: Large File Support"->"2013: HTTP/2 Support"[label="Protocol Expansion"];"2019: HTTP/3 Support"->"2023: 25th Anniversary"[label="Staying Relevant"];"2009: Nordic Free Software Award"->"2017: Polhem Prize"[label="Recognition"];"2021: Contribution to Mars Helicopter"->"2023: 25th Anniversary"[label="Significance"];"1999: Debian Package"->"2003: Autobuild System"[label="Community Effort"];"2003: Autobuild System"->"2017: OSS-Fuzz Integration"[label="Quality Assurance"];"2017: OSS-Fuzz Integration"->"2022: 1,560 Test Cases"[label="Testing"];}
